title: India’s central bank chief warns growing risk of global inflation returning
content: Central banks have managed to engineer a soft landing, but there is still a risk of global inflation returning, according to India's central bank chief.
summary: Central banks have managed to engineer a soft landing, but there is still a risk of global inflation returning, according to India's central bank chief.

title: Here's what the U.S.' enemies — and allies — might see from Marco Rubio as secretary of state
content: Sen. Marco Rubio's nomination as secretary of state will see him become the world's most important diplomat.

title: Britain's car finance industry is in crisis – with banks bracing for billions in payouts
content: The crisis has prompted comparisons to Britain's PPI scandal, which was estimated to have cost banks more than £50 billion ($63.8 billion).

title: It's 'liquidity, stupid': VCs say tech investing is tough amid IPO lull and 'nuts' AI hype

title: SoftBank-backed fintech Zopa aims to double profit this year as it eyes 2025 current account launch
content: British online bank Zopa is on track to double pre-tax profits and increase revenue by more a third in 2024, CEO Jaidev Janardana told CNBC.
summary: British online bank Zopa is on track to double pre-tax profits and increase revenue by more a third in 2024, CEO Jaidev Janardana told CNBC.

title: Tech giants are investing in 'sovereign AI' to help Europe cut its dependence on the U.S.
content: Tech giants are investing in the development of "sovereign" AI models in Europe to reduce the region's dependence on largely U.S.-controlled infrastructure.

title: The season's hottest gift? A travel 'experience' —  here's how to buy one

title: Trump victory may provide TikTok a lifeline to remain in the U.S.
content: Donald Trump's election victory may provide a lifeline for TikTok, which faces a potential U.S. ban in January if not divested from parent company ByteDance.

title: Trump victory drives gold to near 2-month lows as investors pile into equities, cryptocurrencies

title: AMD to lay off 4% of workforce, or about 1,000 employees

title: Tesla initiates sixth Cybertruck recall in a year
content: Tesla is voluntarily recalling 2,431 Cybertrucks to replace defective drive inverters, according to a filing with the National Highway Traffic Administration.

title: Bitcoin briefly tops $93,000 for the first time as investors digest postelection gains, inflation data
content: Bitcoin rose above $93,000 following slightly higher October inflation data Wednesday.

title: Here's the inflation breakdown for October 2024 — in one chart

title: Personal luxury goods market to shrink for first time since the 2008 financial crash, research finds

title: Denmark launches landmark framework for using AI under EU rules — with Microsoft backing
